Introduction

Adios Audio is a Korean rock band consisting of 3 members, Maho, Hojae Lim, Seung Joon Kim. The band debuted on November 23, 2016 with their debut album "night night night"

The band name "Adios Audio" is a combination of the Spanish greeting "Adiós" meaning goodbye and the English word "Audio", the combination of the two words has the meaning the desire to meet many people through live performances, not through audio.
